body:
With Project Air, you can register and interact with IoT Device Farm to process derived data anywhere that is needed and store the data as needed to analyze and address a large number of analytical use cases extending any layer of its architecture as needed. Connect your IoT Device Farm and take action in TIBCO’s connected intelligence cloud.
Architecture A little Sneak Peek of our Architecture, more details after 1st. November
Fully Open Platform that can run anywhere and DIGITIZATION OF THE REAL WORLD.
 Register and Interact with IoT Devices Process IoT Data Regardless of Source Compute at the Edge  Infrastructure Cloud Agnostic Deployment
 AWS Azure * GCP * On-Prem *  Note: * = Runs on pre-existing Kubernetes cluster
Technology Stack Edge to Cloud Ecosystem
 Edge Cloud  Extension Points System Pluggability
 Edge Data Endpoints UI Data Stores

Through TIBCO LABS™, customers and partners can gain insight into TIBCO’s innovation activities, participate in shaping the form of these activities in the years to come, and benefit from TIBCO’s leadership position in integration and analytics.

Project Air by TIBCO LABS™
With Project Air, you can register and interact with IoT Device Farm to process derived data anywhere that is needed and store the data as needed to analyze and address a large number of analytical use cases extending any layer of its architecture as needed. Connect your IoT Device Farm and take action in TIBCO’s connected intelligence cloud.
--Intelligent insights from device to boardroom
Project Air by TIBCO LABS is under on-going a complete makeover, include a new / "one-click" installation experience, new edge capabilities, and a new user experience! Create model-driven / real-time IoT data pipelines, incorporate AI/ML models (including computer vision), deploy everything to the edge, and more!
We are excited about the upcoming release, and are sure you will be as well!
Come back and check us out towards on 1st November for access to the new Project Air experience. The countdown has begun!

Contact us!Reach us for more details, or engage us today !
Read more …
Contributions welcome!We do a Pull Request contributions workflow on GitHub. New users are always welcome!
